about_the_game:
This pack is the FREE Dragon Knight content from the winner of the Fantasy Character Pack Showdown!

This pack contains the Dragon Knight sv actor spritesheet, 8 img-bust files, faceset, 13 enemy variations, animated char sheet, and bonus large-scale full-character artwork

About the original pack:

"Fantasy Character Pack" is a collection of male-type and beast-type characters created by Gee kun soft. It is packed full of beautifully drawn fantasy beastmen and a variety of male character assets perfect for your games beastly enemies! Gee kun soft continues to provide incredible, first-class assets for RPG production in a wide range of fields, such as character materials, character generations, battlers, music, tiles, UI materials, and more.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
